briefdescription.para: Forces the call to the multitasker.
Checks wether the multitasker is activated or not.

simplesect.para: True if it's activated, False if not.

briefdescription.para: Initializes the multitasker and creates the init process.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the init function.
The pid of the process to be unlocked.

briefdescription.para: Blocks the calling process until it's tty is signaled.

parameterdescription.para: The tty of the process to be blocked.

briefdescription.para: Signals the given tty so that any blocked process from it can be unblocked.
Terminates the given process with the given status.

parameterdescription.para: The pid number from the process to be terminated.
The status upon which the process is being terminated.

simplesect.para: A pointer to the OS process table.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the given pid process name.

parameterdescription.para: The pid from the process whose name to be retrieven.

briefdescription.para: Refreshes the process comsumption of every process.
Clears the current tickcount of every process.

simplesect.para: Luciano Zemin, Nicolás Magni, Nicolás Purita
